tagline: We explore wine culture, from grape to glass.
description: Somm.Site is designed for novice, enthusiast and professional wine lovers. Articles, courses and insights into the wonderful world of wine.
altText: Somm.Site is your best source for wine knowledge.
targetAudience: Wine lovers, beverage enthusiasts, hotel and restaurant employees, and hospitality professionals

description: Somm.Tips is a web application that helps you make better choices in the wine shop and off of the restaurant beverage list.
altText: Somm.Tips is your best source for quality beverage recommendations.
targetAudience: Anyone who needs a wine or cocktail recommendation.

tagline: We deliver the highest level of service in the industry.
description: Restaurant Standards is a one stop shop for all restaurant operators pursuing Michelin, Forbes and AAA awards through guest service excellence.
altText: RestaurantStandards.com gives hospitality teams the insight they need to perform at the highest level.
features: General restaurant service knowledge and information
targetAudience: Restaurant operators and employees focused on delivering the best guest service.

tagline: Covering the entire world of beverages on a deeper level.
description: Beverage.fyi covers the world of beverage in detail from beer and cocktails to business and marketing topics.
altText: Beverage.fyi is your best source for beverage education and insights.
targetAudience: Anyone who wants to learn about beverages from around the world.

tagline: Discovering the best in restaurant & hotel operations.
description: Hospitality.fyi covers the hospitality industry on a deeper level, covering the important topics in this category.
altText: Hospitality.fyi dives into the hotel and restaurant industry.
features: General guest service knowledge and information
targetAudience: Anyone looking to discover hospitality operations on a deeper level.

tagline: Deeper dives into all the categories of spirits.
description: Backbar.fyi covers the spirits industry on a deeper level, covering the important topics in this category.
altText: Backbar.fyi helps you discover the world of spirits on a deeper level.
targetAudience: Anyone who wants to learn about spirits from around the world.
